itunes:title: Book to Screen Adaptations + Is the Book Always Better?
title: Book to Screen Adaptations + Is the Book Always Better?
description:
In Episode 69 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee share book to screen adaptation reads. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about whether the book is always better?

**If you enjoy our commercial free podcast please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + our ALL NEW CRIMINALLY BOOKED! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
2:50 Selling the OC (T)
Million Dollar Listing NY
6:45 Scrubby Rinse Free Bath Mittens for Pets (R)

Latest Reads
10:26 The Fortunes of Jaded Women |Carolyn Hunyh (T)
14:58 The Bird Tribunal | Agnes Ravatn (R)
Orenda Books
21:11 Uncommon Type | Tom HanksÂ  @lorikleininak

22:26 Book Talk
Gone Girl
The Lincoln Lawyer
The Town -based on The Prince of Thieves |Chuck Hogan
24:40 The Shining
The Martian |Andy Weir
Big Little Lies
Game of Thrones
Book is better article
Another article
The Idea of You |Robinne Lee
Tell Me Lies |Carola Lovering
Judgement, Suspicion | Joseph Finder
Orphan X| Gregg Hurwitz
Aurora |David Koepp
Jurassic Park |Michael Crichton

40:00 Upcoming Adaptations
Luckiest Girl Alive
Pachinko
No Exit
40:40 125 Books Becoming TV series
All the Light We Cannot See
Black Cake
Daddy
City on Fire
The Devil in the White City
Expats

43:45 Blonde |Joyce Carol Oates (T)

The Book of Goose | Yiyun Li (R)
